body:
chewing mint gum while running to keep my mouth from getting dry

after my run, drinking cold water, and the way it is made "colder" by the mint aftertaste of the gum

didn't fall asleep early last night like i have been lately, which was partly down to eating too many chocolate covered espresso beans, which i do not want to do again, because it did remind me of why i have not consumed caffeine for so long because it's not good for my brain, but it was nice to have more of an evening

writing a little code snippet to parse and display email spam scores and for no good reason naming all the variables and functions with words starting with the letter "p"

laughed a lot with d, including a bit where i just stood very still for a long time and continued to stand very still as she looked over at me

even though we get up at separate times now, cuddling in bed in the morning for a little while, which is so much more important than another ten minutes to look at bullshit on my phone

[these gifs and clips of sharp edges cutting things](https://www.metafilter.com/185960/Sharp-edges-cutting-things)
